attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: introduce a law to prevent the incumbent of the position of Prime Minister, on or after their retirement from that position, from using their former position as a means to gain remuneration unless they give up their right to the pension that they are entitled to and to prevent close relatives of a serving Prime Minister from gaining remuneration by taking advantage of any statute passed by Parliament during the term of office of their relative.

rejection.details: You need to create a clear call-to-action as your petition title - not your name
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
